Why Payroll Giving?

Benefits

Choose A Cause

Employee Experiences

Contact Us

PAYROLL GIVING

ABOUT PAYROLL GIVING

  • Payroll Giving is a unique programme for corporate employees and organizations that want to give back to society Simply put it is an organized monthly activity, where an amount is directly deducted from an employee's salary by the employer to support a cause of their choice.
  • Apart from payroll giving being easy and simple. it also initiates the culture of giving in the organization and instill a team spirit amongst employees who feel linked to a larger cause. It is a great way to demonstrate a corporate's social commitment in an organized manner.
  • Employees can join this voluntary initiative for a small contribution every month, right from the convenience of their desks. Additionally. Payroll Giving also gives the employees of an organization the opportunity to engage at a deeper level with a charity of their choice- by participating in various other activities related to the cause.

CAUSES YOU CAN SUPPORT

Shiksha Na Ruke

Help provide quality education and learning and growth opportunities to underserved children from remote villages and urban slums, opening the doors to a brighter future.

Health Cannot Wait

Take primary healthcare services to the doorsteps of marginalised communities through mobile healthcare units, telemedicine projects, and health camps, promoting overall well-being.

Tayyari Kal Ki

Empower youth with valuable skills, training and placement opportunities, enabling them to become independent, confident and responsible individuals.

She Can Fly

Support programs that uplift women, equipping them with access to healthcare and nutrition, financial literacy and entrepreneurship skills.

BENEFITS FOR CORPORATES

Employee Engagement and Satisfaction

Payroll giving boosts employee engagement and satisfaction and cultivates a sense of purpose and pride within the workplace

Empathetic Work Culture

A regular practice of giving promotes the spirit of empathy, positivity and collaboration as people come together for a larger cause

Attraction and Retention of Talent

Brands that are committed to social change and community welfare have an added advantage and are preferred by employees

Tax Benefits

Participating in payroll giving ofter offers tax incentives for both employers and employees while supporting charitable causes

BENEFITS FOR EMPLOYEES

Choose a Cause
of your choice

Employees choose to contribute to the cause that is closest to their heart from multiple causes

Simple Donation
process

A streamlined process where the chosen amount is automatically deducted from the employee’s monthly salary

Tax Benefits

Individual employees benefit from tax deductions under Section 80G of the Income Tax Act for their contributions

Volunteering

Employees get volunteering opportunities where they can contribute their skills and experience the joy of giving firsthand

Choose a Cause
of your choice

Employees choose to contribute to the cause that is closest to their heart from multiple causes

Simple Donation
process

A streamlined process where the chosen amount is automatically deducted from the employee’s monthly salary

Tax Benefits

Individual employees benefit from tax deductions under Section 80G of the Income Tax Act for their contributions

Volunteering

Employees get volunteering opportunities where they can contribute their skills and experience the joy of giving firsthand

BENEFITS FOR NON-PROFITS

Steady Funds
Long-Term Sustainability
Focused on Impact
Partnership Opportunities
Community Support
Steady Funds

Payroll giving provides us with predictable funding that allows us plan and execute our programmes more effectively, ensuring continuous support to our beneficiaries

Long-Term Sustainability
Payroll giving encourages recurring donations, which contribute to the long-term sustainability of nonprofits enabling us to undertake projects with longer timeframes.
Focused on Impact

Traditional fundraising efforts can be resource-intensive and costly. Payroll giving saves us time and resources that can be directed toward our core mission.

Partnership Opportunities

Payroll giving can lead to deeper partnerships between nonprofits and corporates. It opens the door to joint initiatives, employee volunteering, skill-sharing, and collaborative projects

Community Support

When corporates engage in payroll giving, they encourage a culture of philanthropy among their employees. This fosters a sense of community and encourages employees to become more involved in supporting nonprofit initiatives beyond financial contributions.

EMPLOYEE EXPERIENCES

Smile Foundation team will help you curate the best possible corporate employee engagement activities that are aligned with your mission, employee interest, geography requirements and budget. Our corporate engagement ideas are bound to make your employees feel special and deeply involved in important social causes. 

Employee, Adobe India

We picked up this initiative with Smile Foundation wherein we realised that a lot of children who commute to school stay pretty far away from it. So, we came up with this unique idea of donating bicycles to children. It was amazing.  Big Thanks to Adobe and Smile Foundation for this touching experience

Watch Video

Kabir Shakir Ahmed, CFO, Microsoft India

Spending time with these children reminds me that intelligence, ability and dreams are not chosen for just a few. These children prove that they are special and they are clearly the bright future of India.

Watch Video

Neha Dabral, Employee, Avery Dennison

These girls are now my dose of motivation. We all keep complaining about our lives, but each one of these girls is truly fighting a battle with big smiles on their faces. It felt so good to spend a day with them. I came to encourage, and went back inspired! I feel proud to be associated with Avery Dennison where we get such wonderful chances to do some good in our own little ways. 

IS YOUR ORGANISATION CONSIDERING PAYROLL GIVING?

Let’s start a conversation today. Connect directly with our Corporate Partnerships Team to get started.

Write to Parul Sharma – 9266740073
cp@smilefoundationindia.org
